questions_and_notes: Shouldn't description be worded "atmospheric column" rather than "grid cell"? The CF standard name description says "Time fraction" means a fraction of a time interval. The interval in question must be specified by the values or bounds of the time coordinate variable associated with the data. "X_time_fraction" means the fraction of the time interval during which X occurs."  So, in cell_methods probably it should be time: mean, not time: point.
specific_issues: 8:Deprecate? Only 3 groups contributed this variable in CMIP6.
long_name: Fraction of Time Shallow Convection Occurs
comment: Fraction of time that shallow convection occurs in the grid cell.
